product_name: ExOfficio Exo Dri Long-Sleeve T-Shirt - Men's - 2014 Closeout
long_description: This long-sleeve crew may look like an ordinary T-shirt, but this moisture-wicking tech top features odor-control fabric and UPF 20 sun protection, so you can be outside and sweat as long as you want.
short_description: This long-sleeve crew may look like an ordinary T-shirt, but this moisture-wicking tech top features odor-control fabric and UPF 20 sun protection, so you can be outside and sweat as long as you want.
